Hello, I would like to make an announcement in #announce to tell everyone that you are now able to use ```rs on GitHub to highlight code blocks. Is that allowed? I would like to make more people aware of it as I think it can save everyone some time.

Yeah, I think #announce isn't really used for announcements like this. #general sounds good to me.
I would still like to see someone set rust as the default language so you can just use ```
